content: I have sent a couple of requests too Nikolai for CDex Payer sandbox access, but still have not received a response. I would like to use the tool for CDEX and possibly PCDE Payer access too
We actually checked that you were a registered user yesterday and saw your name in the list @Christol Green, so something weird must be going on...
ï¿¼yes. Christol.green@anthem.com is in the user list for CDEX provider. I added the email in CDEX payer too.
@Nikolai Schwertner is going to reach out to you directly - or you can join the Zoom CDex/PCDE session now
Thanks @Lloyd McKenzie @Christol Green - apologies, for some reason I didn't get the Zullip notification. I just sent you the invitations to the sandboxes. Please let me know if you received them
